# Pre-Requisites {#pre-req}


## Essential 


### Install R from The Comprehensive R Archive Network



1. Install a pre-compiled binary of R for your OS from here:  
    <https://cloud.r-project.org>  
    If you already have R installed, then Check your current version like so:
    ```{r}
    R.version.string
    ```


### Install RStudio Desktop 


1. Install RStudio Desktop.  
   If you do not already have RStudio installed, then download it here:  
    <https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download>
    
    
### Update your R packages

1. Update your R packages:
    ```{r, eval = FALSE}
    update.packages(ask = FALSE, checkBuilt = TRUE)
    ```
